org.apache.struts.taglib
Class EncodeRedirectURLTag

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
        |
        +--org.apache.struts.taglib.EncodeRedirectURLTag
public final class EncodeRedirectURLTag
extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport

Custom tag implementation that acts like <jsp:getProperty> but encodes the output stream so that HTML-related characters do not cause difficulties.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $ $Date: 2000/08/01 20:03:31 $
Author:
Craig R. McClanahan
See Also:
